heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny south. Periods of clouds Adirondacks and Rt. 4 north. Flurries far north.

heading: Friday Night
text: Clearing, then more clouds late. Breezy.
temperature: 20s to low 30s west, upper teens and 20s east

heading: Saturday
text: Breezy. Chance of a flurry or sprinkle far north.
temperature: Upper 30s to mid 40s north, mid to upper 40s south

heading: Sunday
text: Periods of light snow, mainly south and east.
temperature: Teens to around 20 north, 20s to around 30 south
